text: Hubert Seed Wilkinson (7 June 1897 – 5 May 1984)Obituaries The Times (London, England), Wednesday, May 16, 1984; pg. 12; Issue 61832 was an Anglican priest in the 20th Century.‘WILKINSON, Ven. Hubert Seed’, Who Was Who, A & C Black, an imprint of Bloomsbury Publishing plc, 1920–2015; online edn, Oxford University Press, 2014 ; online edn, April 2014 He served in the Royal Artillery from 1916 to 1919 when he entered Durham University. After a curacy in Colne he held incumbencies in Harpurhey, Chester-le-Street, Allerton, Winster,Church History AmblesideCumbria County History and Grassendale.Church Web Site He was Archdeacon of Westmorland from 1947 to 1951;Ecclesiastical News The Times (London, England), Monday, Oct 23, 1950; pg. 6; Issue 51829 and Archdeacon of Liverpool from 1951 to 1970.Church news The Times (London, England), Thursday, Jan 14, 1971; pg. 16; Issue 58072 ==Notes== Category:1897 births Category:Archdeacons of Westmorland Category:Archdeacons of Liverpool Category:1984 deaths Category:Alumni of St John's College, Durham
title: Hubert Wilkinson
